verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
INTRO: C(no3) Am G/B C (6x)
G C2 F2 C2 (2X)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Oh God, You are my God,
And I will ever praise You.
Oh God, You are my God,
And I will ever praise You.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I will seek You in the morning,
And I will learn to walk in Your ways.
And step by step You lead me, (2X)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
FIRST ENDING:
And I will follow You all of my days.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
SECOND ENDING:
And I will follow You all of my days
C2/A
And I will follow You all of my days
Yea, yeah!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Hallelujah!
We honor You, Lord Jesus and forever we will sing.
Hallelujah!
For You alone are worthy, and forever we will sing.
Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
Hallelujah! Hallelujah!

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
BREAK:
Dsus Dsus Em7 Em7 Am7(4) Am7(4) C2 C2

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Dsus
We honor You, Lord Jesus! (We honor You, Lord Jesus!)
We lift Your name on high! (Lift your name on high!)
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, oh!

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
Hallelujah!
We honor You, Lord Jesus and forever we will sing.
Hallelujah!
For You alone are worthy, and forever we will sing.

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
